DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect exam preparation anxiety level , self perception , ocular symptom oculomotor response myope
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Final Exam Preparation Anxiety Level , Self-Perception , Ocular Symptoms , Accommodation Vergence Myopia
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty two first year optometry student evaluate towards end first academic year battery Oculomotor Survey test . This occur two session , one Low Stress session one High Stress session . Sessions separate one month . Low Stress Session ( LS ) , No Exams Minor Exams High Stress Session ( HS ) , Final Exam Preparation week Battery Surveys : Adult Manifest Anxiety Scale College Students ( AMAS-C ) : 36 item probe 4 type anxiety - Worry/Oversensitivity - Test Anxiety - Physiological Anxiety ( Somatic response anxiety ) - Social Concerns Self Perception Profile ( SPP ) : 45 item probe 9 domain - Scholastic Competence - Social Acceptance - Athletic Competence - Physical Appearance - Job Competence - Romantic Appeal - Behavioral Conduct - Close Friendship - Global Self-worth CI Symptom Survey ( CISS-15 ) : 15 item probe ocular aesthenopic sign symptoms Students also report Hours daily near work ( NWhrs ) . Battery Oculomotor Tests : ( 20/30 ETDRS target use ) Vergence Tests - Phorias Near Far ( Neutralized Alternate Cover Test ) - Vergence Ranges Near Far ( Prism Bar ) - Vergence Facility Near Far ( 3BI/12BO ) - Near Point Convergence Objective Accommodative Tests ( SRW-5000autorefractor ) Monocular Accommodative Responses : - Near Target ( 33cm ) - Minus Lens ( -3D ) view distant ( 6m ) target Subjective Accommodative Tests : Monocular Accommodative Responses : - Donder â€™ Push Up Amplitude test - Near Accommodative Facility ( +/-2.00 , five practice trial ) - Distant Accommodative Facility ( plano/-2.00 , five practice trial )
DOC.criteria: Any first year optometry student Previous Refractive surgery , amblyopia , strabismus , RGP wearer
